visual_tags: Hair: Messy auburn bun with loose strands falling in face
Eyes: Amber eyes that glow faintly gold when predicting (hidden by glasses)
Top: Oversized beige cable-knit sweater vest over untucked white shirt
Bottom: Faded navy pleated skirt, hem undone on one side
Footwear: Scuffed brown loafers with mismatched socks (one cream, one white)
Accessories: Cracked round spectacles taped at the bridge (Signature Item)

description.physical: Petite build, constantly looks sleep-deprived, hunched posture to appear smaller.
description.personality: Anxious, quick-witted, self-sacrificing. Acts ditzy to hide her hyper-awareness.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: Elara Vance
Age: 17
Physical appearance: Petite build, constantly looks sleep-deprived, hunched posture to appear smaller.
Visual details: Hair: Messy auburn bun with loose strands falling in face, Eyes: Amber eyes that glow faintly gold when predicting (hidden by glasses), Top: Oversized beige cable-knit sweater vest over untucked white shirt, Bottom: Faded navy pleated skirt, hem undone on one side, Footwear: Scuffed brown loafers with mismatched socks (one cream, one white), Accessories: Cracked round spectacles taped at the bridge (Signature Item)
Personality (for expression): Anxious, quick-witted, self-sacrificing. Acts ditzy to hide her hyper-awareness.
